mapper.insert:
insert into Inventory (cInvCode, cInvAddCode, cInvName, cInvStd, cInvCCode, cVenCode, cReplaceItem, cPosition, bSale, bPurchase, bSelf, bComsume, bProducing, bService, bAccessary, iTaxRate, dSDate, dEDate, cInvDefine1, I_id, cCreatePerson, cModifyPerson, dModifyDate, cValueType, cPlanMethod, bMPS, bROP, bRePlan, cSRPolicy, bBillUnite, cShopUnit, fConvertRate, bInvModel, bKCCutMantissa, bReceiptByDT, iImpTaxRate, iPlanDefault, iAllocatePrintDgt, bCheckBatch, bMngOldpart) values
(#{item.cinvcode}, #{item.cinvaddcode}, #{item.cinvname}, #{item.cinvstd}, #{item.cinvccode}, #{item.cvencode}, #{item.creplaceitem}, #{item.cposition}, #{item.bsale}, #{item.bpurchase}, #{item.bself}, #{item.bcomsume}, #{item.bproducing}, #{item.bservice}, #{item.baccessary}, #{item.itaxrate}, #{item.dsdate}, #{item.dedate}, #{item.cinvdefine1}, #{item.iId}, #{item.ccreateperson}, #{item.cmodifyperson}, #{item.dmodifydate}, #{item.cvaluetype}, #{item.cplanmethod}, #{item.bmps}, #{item.brop}, #{item.breplan}, #{item.csrpolicy}, #{item.bbillunite}, #{item.cshopunit}, #{item.fconvertrate}, #{item.binvmodel}, #{item.bkccutmantissa}, #{item.breceiptbydt}, #{item.iimptaxrate}, #{item.iplandefault}, #{item.iallocateprintdgt}, #{item.bcheckbatch}, #{item.bmngoldpart})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE cInvCode = values (cInvCode), cInvAddCode = values (cInvAddCode), cInvName = values (cInvName), cInvStd = values (cInvStd), cInvCCode = values (cInvCCode), cVenCode = values (cVenCode), cReplaceItem = values (cReplaceItem), cPosition = values (cPosition), bSale = values (bSale), bPurchase = values (bPurchase), bSelf = values (bSelf), bComsume = values (bComsume), bProducing = values (bProducing), bService = values (bService), bAccessary = values (bAccessary), iTaxRate = values (iTaxRate), dSDate = values (dSDate), dEDate = values (dEDate), cInvDefine1 = values (cInvDefine1), I_id = values (I_id), cCreatePerson = values (cCreatePerson), cModifyPerson = values (cModifyPerson), dModifyDate = values (dModifyDate), cValueType = values (cValueType), cPlanMethod = values (cPlanMethod), bMPS = values (bMPS), bROP = values (bROP), bRePlan = values (bRePlan), cSRPolicy = values (cSRPolicy), bBillUnite = values (bBillUnite), cShopUnit = values (cShopUnit), fConvertRate = values (fConvertRate), bInvModel = values (bInvModel), bKCCutMantissa = values (bKCCutMantissa), bReceiptByDT = values (bReceiptByDT), iImpTaxRate = values (iImpTaxRate), iPlanDefault = values (iPlanDefault), iAllocatePrintDgt = values (iAllocatePrintDgt), bCheckBatch = values (bCheckBatch), bMngOldpart = values (bMngOldpart)
